name: roquefort
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of white and blue French cheese made from the milk of sheep: I had a salad that contained Roquefort, grapes, and watercress. After lunch we enjoyed a little Roquefort cheese and a glass of red wine. Today, I just fancy a good strong cheese like a brie or roquefort.
More examplesFewer examplesJean-Pierre is a farmer who raises sheep for making Roquefort cheese.You can't sell a cheese as Roquefort unless it has been aged in a cave for at least three months.
